h3.strong: The mission of the George-Little Rock School District is to provide quality education by promoting lifelong learning.

div.p:
GLR elementary is looking for free standing clothing racks. If you have any you would be willing to sell/donate, please contact Mrs. Aeikens at kaeikens@george-littlerock.org
Thank you!

div.p: The George-Little Rock schools are in need of good packing boxes to begin moving classrooms for the realignment. The drop sites will be Monday through Friday from 8 am- 12 pm at both locations. George- Leave outside under the canopy of the elementary buiding. Little...

a.title: Share this post in your email

div.a: 2 Â Â Â View on Facebook

br.span:
We are in need of good packing boxes to begin moving classrooms for the realignment. The drop sites will be Mon-Fri from 8:00 am -12:00 pm at both locations. G- leave outside under the canopy of the elementary building. LR- leave outside the west entrance doors. Thank You!
View on Twitter

a.title: Share this post in your email

br.span:
Please read the following for our school update: https://t.co/efV5vIrmIN
View on Twitter

a.title: Share this post in your email

br.span:
The GLR meal program will resume today. There has been a change in the Little Rock pick up location. Until further notice, please use the doors located on the south side of the building to pick up the lunches. The pick up location at the George site will remain the same.
View on Twitter

a.title: Share this post in your email

br.span:
Check our Senior Spotlight! We will update new seniors every couple days!
https://t.co/O00WQD39ov
View on Twitter

a.title: Share this post in your email

br.span:
Just a Reminder that our meal program will be closed TODAY. Our meal program will resume tomorrow. We encourage ALL families to sign up for the FREE meal program. Please call 712-475-3311 ext. 127 or email: ctrei @george-littlerock.org.
View on Twitter

a.title: Share this post in your email

div.h3: If you would like information about GLR schools or if there is any way we can assist you, please do not hesitate to contact us. We would love to give you more information about any of our schools.

article.class: george-little-rock-schools-announcements post-6307 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-george-little-rock-schools-announcements intense_post

div.p: The George-Little Rock Community School District (GLR) is based in George and Little Rock, Iowa. George-Little Rock Community Schools are home to the Mustangs and proud of their successful academics, athletics, fine arts programs, and student organizations.

George, IA 51237
